text: haey puokke kaban thveu aoy sa trauv breachy daoyman kar anounhnhat pi a l laoh haey da vou d kaban samleab cheu lout . banteab mk a l laoh ban bratan tamneng chea se dch ning chea na pi aoy tow da voud promteang ban bangrien dl keat ampi avei del trong mean chetnea . haey brasenbae kmean kar tbskat robsa a l laoh champoh mnoussa lok pi krom muoy( anak mean chomnue) tow krom muoy( anak kmean chomnue) te noh brakadchea phendei nih trauv vineasa a nd reay te a l laoh mean kdei me tda krounea leu piphp teangoasa
